name: Show Racism the Red Card

name: Show Racism the Red Card

name: Show Racism the Red Card
tweet: #BLACKHISTORYMONTH: Meghan Markle's marriage to Prince Harry provided hope of greater inclusivity and tolerance for many Black Britons in 2018. tweet: ...and I hope today we are able to spread that message far and wide.  I hope as many people as possible will join me in wearing red on Friday and help ‚ÄòShow Racism the Red Card‚Äô continue its work to educate people on the profound effects racism can have on people‚Äôs lives.

name: Show Racism the Red Card
tweet: ‚ÄúOur city is renowned for being safe and welcoming to everyone and I‚Äôm really pleased we‚Äôre able to show our support to such a worthy cause.  There can be no room for racism in our communities. It is completely unacceptable for people to be targeted simply for being themselves...

name: Show Racism the Red Card

name: Show Racism the Red Card
tweet: #BLACKHISTORYMONTH: Shirley Chisholm was the first Black woman elected to U.S. Congress in 1968.
